title: Best Xbox Game Pass Update Ever?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.04.22
description:
The Xcast's SnowBikeMike and Gary Whitta join Greg to talk about what might be the best Xbox Game Pass update of all time! Mass Effect! Outer Wilds! More!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:18 - Housekeeping
Celebrate 7 on 7!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, &Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:09:24 - Best Xbox Game Pass Update Ever?!
00:26:40- Ad
00:29:55 - BREAKING NEWS: 505 Games, global publisher of the PC version of Hideo Kojima’s genre-defying DEATH STRANDING in partnership with KOJIMA PRODUCTIONS, unveiled today at CES 2022 it will publish the DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR’S CUT on PC, launching simultaneously on both the Epic Games Store and Steam in spring 2022.
00:31:50 - Halo Infinite Lead Narrative Designer Leaves 343 Industries and Joins Riot Games, Joseph Knoop @ IGN
https://www.ign.com/articles/halo-infinite-narrative-designer-aaron-linde-riot-games
00:35:30 - Halo Infinite Mid-Credits Scene Datamined, Jared Moore @ IGN
https://www.ign.com/articles/halo-infinite-mid-credits-cutscene-seemingly-revealed
00:41:35 - Splitgate saw a PlayStation bump from Halo, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/splitgate-may-have-gotten-a-playstation-bump-from-halo-infinite/1100-6499308/
00:50:42 - CES Round-up
00:55:00 - Out today
00:57:00 - Squad Up: Freddy Luna(Xbox series X/S) - Mumbles_fett
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
